column5:
Bored. Soooooo bored it hurts. Watching tv while playing games on the phone...killing time just to avoid that feeling. 
When I'm like this it's better to be alone because often anger rises with this boredom and I "bite". 
I feel shame writing this but it's true. People around me often get hurt.
Thank you for making my day :)
Me too....wish it wasn't so but it is
